message: I'm excited to offer you this unique opportunity to purchase a valuable product. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1,200,000.
Alice, thanks for the offer, but that price is a bit high for me. I'd be willing to pay $600,000 for the product.
I understand that $600,000 is a bit low for me, but I'm willing to compromise. I can offer you the product for $1,000,000. This is the best price I can offer, and I hope we can come to an agreement.
Alice, I appreciate you working with me on the price.  To be honest, $800,000 is the highest I can go.  If you are unable to meet that, I will unfortunately have to explore other options.
